directions: Combine first 7 ingredients in large bowl. Whisk Dijon mustard and cider vinegar in small bowl. Gradually whisk in olive oil. Add to salad and toss to coat. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.) Line large bowl with kale. Fill with salad. Garnish salad with cilantro sprigs and serve.
ingredients: 4 15-ounce cans black-eyed peas, rinsed, well drained
4 cups diced peeled cored fresh pineapple (1 large pineapple)
1 7-ounce jar roasted bell peppers, drained, diced
title: Black-Eyed Pea, Pineapple and Red Pepper Salad
